target: I'd be happy to. Can you tell me a date, time and how many people in your party?
context: <user>  Hi, I'm looking for a nightclub in town please. <system>  There are several nightclubs in town. I recommend ballare. It is found in the center of town. <user>  Okay, could you tell me he postcode and the entrance fee? <system>  Sure thing! Entry fee is 5 pounds and postcode is cb23na. <user>  I would also like to eat in the center of town. <system>  We have many dining options available in city centre. Do you have a price range or style of food you would prefer? <user>  Are there any steakhouses in the centre? <system>  Unfortunately not. Do you want to broaden your search?<user>  Can you find something with italian food instead? <system>  Oh, great choice. I love Italian too. There are several options. How about Zizzi Cambridge?<user>  That sounds great, what's the price range for Zizzi Cambridge? <system>  Zizzi Cambridge is relatively cheap, but the food is sublime. Would you like me to book it for you?<user>  That sounds great, please do. <system>
